message:
@slack-incidents-edu

EDU Email Events Runbook https://joinhandshake.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DA/pages/2144404005/Runbooks+EDU+Email+Events

The. EDU Email Events Database is utilizing > 60% of its' CPU

Once this monitor resolves please keep a close eye on the CPU utilization. If it stays high or near 60%, there is a chance that a greater conversation needs to occur on whether or not our US EDU Email-Events DB has enough provisioned CPU.
name: [US] EDU Email Events DB High CPU

options.escalation_message:
Renotification: EDU Email Events DB still has High CPU
